62b6('bum): 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa
62b7('bum): brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam
63a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams
63a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi ces bya bar skyon to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab
63a3('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar
63a4('bum): skyon to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to//
63a5('bum): snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rgyun du
63a6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// b+hir mi
63a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam
63b1('bum): gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya/
63b2('bum): bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ de bzhiran gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten ji ltar dben
63b3('bum): zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nor ba'i 'jig rten dper zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed
63b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes zla bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya
63b5('bum): bar ston to/ / sna'i 'jig ce dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten dben 'os
63b6('bum): dra bar spyon to/ / gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar spyon to// swA'i 'jig rten dper zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten dben pas bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten dban nyes
63b7('bum): bya bar ston to/ / reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig ca dper zhes bya bar son to//
64a1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stod to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig
64a2('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg
64a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te/
64a4('bum): rerig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dber zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi
64a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
64a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
64a7('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i
64b1('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig
64b2('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben
64b3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes
64b4('bum): bya bar ston to/ / reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stor to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig
64b5('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
64b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig
64b7('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
65a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben
65a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben
65a3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
65a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya
65a5('bum): pabar ston to/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
65a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
65a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
65b1('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul/
65b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dper zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub
65b3('bum): kyi yan gyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dper zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
65b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs
65b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
65b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
65b7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes
66a1('bum): bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
66a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben nas bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//
66a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
66a4('bum): bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub
66a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// /
66a6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
66a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig
66b1('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
66b2('bum): bya bar ston to/ / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig
66b3('bum): gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
66b4('bum): bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten mtha'
66b5('bum): las 'das pa spyod pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar skon to// sgra'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston
66b6('bum): to/ / dri'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
66b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar stor to/ / chos kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
67a1('bum): ston to/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong/
67a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
67a3('bum): zhes bya bar skor to/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
67a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
67a5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
67a6('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten
67a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te/
67b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa spong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
67b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
67b3('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig
67b4('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / me'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten mtha'
67b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten
67b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
67b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
68a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / skye mched drug gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
68a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i
68a3('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
68a4('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar/
68a5('bum): ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
68a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las
68a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
68b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar smon to/ / kyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig che mtha' las 'das pa stod pa zhes bya bar ston to// byinang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mthar las 'das pa spyod pa zhes bya bar ston to// s
68b2('bum): tong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong
68b3('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'dus byas spyong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa spyod pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
68b4('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
68b5('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
68b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
68b7('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong
69a1('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stor to//
69a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
69a3('bum): ston to/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
69a4('bum): ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan
69a5('bum): lag rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stor to// 'phags
69a6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi
69a7('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa
69b1('bum): brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam
69b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las
69b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
69b4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
69b5('bum): bya bar ston to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stos
69b6('bum): to/ / snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston
69b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
70a1('bum): #/ stor to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mthar las 'das pa stong pakas
70a2('bum): bar ston to/ / rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam
70a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
70a4('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i
70a5('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i
70a6('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
70a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
70b1('bum): bar ston to/ / gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i
70b2('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes
70b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
70b4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid
70b5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten po
70b6('bum): bopo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
70b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa
71a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
71a2('bum): to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
71a3('bum): ton to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
71a4('bum): bya bar ston to/ / sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
71a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes
71a6('bum): pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam
71a7('bum): par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
71b1('bum): ston to/ / reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// len
71b2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig
71b3('bum): rtecan ngo bo nyid stong ya zhes bya bar ston to/ / spyir pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
71b4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
71b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi
71b6('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong
71b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
72a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
72a2('bum): bar ston to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar sbyor to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dor
72a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
72a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
72a5('bum): ston ton to/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med
72a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
72a7('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
72b1('bum): bar ston to/ / stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan
72b2('bum): lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten
72b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
72b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
72b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams
72b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
72b7('bum): bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
73a1('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i
73a2('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten
73a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
73a4('bum): bar ston to/ / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
73a5('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang
73a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshe
73a7('bum): pa la ji ltar 'jig can dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig
73b1('bum): rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
73b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
73b3('bum): to/ / rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten dngos po mang
73b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
73b5('bum): gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo ba
73b6('bum): nyid spyod pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ro'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rag gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos
73b7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par
74a1('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
74a2('bum): to/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
74a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stor to// mig gi 'dus te reb pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rma
74a4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te//
74a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stor to//
74a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
74a7('bum): bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
74b1('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus
74b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
74b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
74b4('bum): me'i khams kyi 'jig rter dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams
74b5('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dngos
74b6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
74b7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
75a1('bum): bya bar ston to/ / reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
75a2('bum): sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
75a3('bum): nying stong pa zhes bya bar stor to/ / skye ba'i 'jig rter dngos po red pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
75a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
75a5('bum): ston to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
75a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos
75a7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
75b1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
75b2('bum): bar ston to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngor dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
75b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stor to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha'
75b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
75b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa
75b6('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos
75b7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
76a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med
76a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
76a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub
76a4('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
76a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
76a6('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
76a7('bum): ston to/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
76b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes
76b2('bum): pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
76b3('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi
76b4('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i
76b5('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
76b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
76b7('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid
77a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes
77a2('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
77a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ji
77a4('bum): ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
77a5('bum): 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
77a6('bum): sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi
77a7('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / spa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten
77b1('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
77b2('bum): to/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
77b3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rter zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
77b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
77b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
77b6('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
77b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar
78a1('bum): ston to/ / chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ci zhes bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
78a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi
78a3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg
78a4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i
78a5('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
78a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
78a7('bum): bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
78b1('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// /
78b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus
78b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi
78b4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stor to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
78b5('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong
78b6('bum): ba nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
78b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig can zhi zhes
79a1('bum): bya bar ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten nyi zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi
79a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams
79a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par
79a4('bum): thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rter zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan

79a6('bum): to/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
79a7('bum): bya bar ston to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
79b1('bum): ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten 'i zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras/
79b2('bum): bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig
79b3('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar
79b4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
79b5('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
79b6('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ / 'du shes kyi 'jig rter stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya

80a3('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam

80b1('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces

81a2('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid

81a6('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// don dam pa
81a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
81b1('bum): sa skye rnams pa sa
81b2('bum): rjod pa so
81b3('bum): nyid ces byar na/ / rlu bdu sa pa rnams 'ji rten spyong pa nyid rgyas 'ang ldan // yang ngan par spyong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten pang mnyid kyis bya bar
81b4('bum): ga pa sa 'angabacan shA nyi sa byer m+sa/ / / dbang rnams kyi 'jig can stong banyid ces bya bar ston to/ chubs rnams kyi 'jib rjid snang nyi
81b5('bum): kyimarnam rnams tha'ajig da kyis byabang dag/ 'ab pa'i lam pa 'ag brgyang pa'i 'ang ba nyin stong pa nyid ces bya bar cin / #
82a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten

82a6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byam pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// snying rje
82a7('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig
82b1('bum): cer stong pa nyid ces bya bar smon to/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten spong ba nyid ces bya bar son to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston mo/
82b2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong panyi ces
82b3('bum): bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten
82b4('bum): ston pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyes brgya bcu gnyis pa// / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
82b5('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ de ci'i phyir/
82b6('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes
82b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//
83a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
83a2('bum): 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom/
83a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab
83a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab
83a5('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar
83a6('bum): gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
83a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i dor to// rab 'byor
83b1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor /
83b2('bum): ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid
83b3('bum): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
83b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin/
83b5('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa
83b6('bum): dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
83b7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab
84a1('bum): 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med de/ sus kyang gzhal bar mi
84a2('bum): nus so/ / rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du med pa'i
84a3('bum): phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
84a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa yang su yang med na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
84a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
84a6('bum): sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang
84a7('bum): mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang
84b1('bum): byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/
84b2('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med de/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
84b3('bum): tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
84b4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi
84b5('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
84b6('bum): rab 'byor rna ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa sa
84b7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor lce yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyang bsam gyis mi
85a1('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang ma
85a2('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor smra yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
85a3('bum): ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor dri yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ro yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
85a4('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor reg kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
85a5('bum): chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
85a6('bum): pa stemi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor/

85b7('bum): ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
86a1('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/

92b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor len pa bsam
92b2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang

92b4('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
92b5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi
92b6('bum): dmigs so/ / rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor brtson 'grus
92b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis
93a1('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
93a2('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi

93b1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi

93b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi byab dpag

93b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so//
93b6('bum): rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpab tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid

94a2('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang

94b1('bum): bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag

99a1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis

99a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab

99a7('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
99b1('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
99b2('bum): du chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor dam pa stong pa nyid bsam

99b5('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing // mi mnyam
99b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ / ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
99b7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
100a1('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// /
100a2('bum): ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan
100a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi/
100a4('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
100a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
100a6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
100a7('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
100b1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
100b2('bum): ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu pa mchis bzhal du ma ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa labs/ ci'i slad du dbang po
100b3('bum): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
100b4('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis bzhal du ma mchis
100b5('bum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shingag
100b6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
100b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
101a1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshang med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing // mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
101a2('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
101a3('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi byab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar
101a4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
101a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
101a6('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags//
101a7('bum): ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi
101b1('bum): sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bas// /
101b2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
101b3('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
101b4('bum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
101b5('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
101b6('bum): slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
101b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
102a1('bum): 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ / ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
102a2('bum): bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
102a3('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing

102a6('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya bcu gsum pa// // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
102a7('bum): 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam

103b7('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
104a1('bum): so/ / rab 'byor sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dngag

104b1('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sred pa la

105a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// /
105a2('bum): rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa

105a7('bum): so/ / rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
105b1('bum): nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang

105b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
105b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsab pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
105b7('bum): dran pa pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang bsam pa
106a1('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa

106a3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa

106a6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
106a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams la
106b1('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
106b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
106b3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
106b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
106b5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
106b6('bum): dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
106b7('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor byams pa chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
107a1('bum): mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor snying rje chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
107a2('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang /
107a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
107a4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
107a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang byang chub la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa
107a6('bum): shes pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
107a7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
107b1('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
107b2('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam
107b3('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i srad du mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
107b4('bum): rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snal bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
107b5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
107b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang
107b7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri la bsam pa dang
108a1('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
108a2('bum): du reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
108a3('bum): slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
108a4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa la
108a5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
108a6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag
108a7('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
108b1('bum): ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
108b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid
108b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
108b4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa

108b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag
108b7('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
109a1('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams la//

109a6('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ming dang

109b1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
109b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa la bsam pa dang /

109b5('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
109b6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
109b7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan/
110a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang
110a2('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
