110a4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po
110a5('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
110a6('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam la mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma
110a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
110b1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags//
110b2('bum): ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
110b3('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
110b4('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
110b5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
110b6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po
110b7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du drad pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa
111a1('bum): dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
111a2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du dbang po rnams
111a3('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag par 'tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
111a4('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
111a5('bum): brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
111a6('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshang
111a7('bum): med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang
111b1('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag//
111b2('bum): ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
111b3('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshad ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la
111b4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
111b5('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
111b6('bum): stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
111b7('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i srang
112a1('bum): du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang
112a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
112a3('bum): ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa
112a4('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
112a5('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa
112a6('bum): nga tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag ci'i slad
112a7('bum): du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
112b1('bum): rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
112b2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag/

112b4('bum): phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
112b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
112b6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
112b7('bum): 'byor mig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya
113a1('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang

113a3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/

113a6('bum): med gzhal du med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo
113a7('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
113b1('bum): dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir smra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
113b2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dril bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
113b3('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rol bsam pa dang dpag/
113b4('bum): nga tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang
113b5('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
113b6('bum): chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mang
113b7('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par
114a1('bum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
114a2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
114a3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
114a4('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus
114a5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
114a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mang la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid
114a7('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mer
114b1('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg/
114b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
114b3('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
114b4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang /
114b5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
114b6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
114b7('bum): rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag/
115a1('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
115a2('bum): du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
115a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mang la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
115a4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
115a5('bum): med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i
115a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa
115a7('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
115b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te
115b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang
115b3('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
115b4('bum): de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
115b5('bum): du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
115b6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
115b7('bum): rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
116a1('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
116a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
116a3('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i kham la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma rig
116a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma de gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
116a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
116a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
116a7('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
116b1('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye mched drug gi ngo bo
116b2('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
116b3('bum): rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
116b4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa
116b5('bum): ngang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred
116b6('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa
116b7('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
117a1('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye ba'i
117a2('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
117a3('bum): rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
117a4('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
117a5('bum): phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
117a6('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
117a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam
117b1('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa/
117b2('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
117b3('bum): phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
117b4('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
117b5('bum): ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lasam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
117b6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa ngang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor
117b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam
118a1('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
118a2('bum): de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dpa tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
118a3('bum): med gzhal du ma la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid
118a4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
118a5('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la
118a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
118a7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
118b1('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
118b2('bum): dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa
118b3('bum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
118b4('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor/
118b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
118b6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
118b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
119a1('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
119a2('bum): dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
119a3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
119a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi
119a5('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
119a6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa
119a7('bum): nyid la bsam pa rang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
119b1('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor/
119b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang
119b3('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
119b4('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
119b5('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
119b6('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang
119b7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
120a1('bum): de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
120a2('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
120a3('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
120a4('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
120a5('bum): med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam
120a6('bum): gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
120a7('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad med pa
120b1('bum): rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag/
120b2('bum): tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
120b3('bum): rab 'byor rnams par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
120b4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
120b5('bum): stede'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
120b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
120b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
121a1('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
121a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang
121a3('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
121a4('bum): ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam
121a5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
121a6('bum): dmibs so/ / rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa
121a7('bum): rang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
121b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid
121b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
121b3('bum): rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
121b4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
121b5('bum): de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid
121b6('bum): bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
121b7('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig
122a1('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i nyid bsam gyis//
122a2('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
122a3('bum): so/ / rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
122a4('bum): pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
122a5('bum): ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
122a6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
122a7('bum): so/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
122b1('bum): pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa 'am po nyis
122b2('bum): brgya bcu bzhi pa/ / // rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmig
122b3('bum): su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab
122b4('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
122b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam
122b6('bum): par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang
122b7('bum): bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag tu mad gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
123a1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmigs su yod ngam/ lce gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmigs su// /
123a2('bum): yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmigs su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
123a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/
123a4('bum): sgra gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
123a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis
123a6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg dmigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
123a7('bum): pa de la chos dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su
123b1('bum): yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par
123b2('bum): shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis/
123b3('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
123b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
123b5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
123b6('bum): de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg
123b7('bum): pa dmigs su yod dam/ sku'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/
124a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus
124a2('bum): te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab
124a3('bum): dpag tu mang gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
124a4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
124a5('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis
124a6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang
124a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
124b1('bum): tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
124b2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam
124b3('bum): gyis mi khyab pag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmigs su yong dam/ chu'i khams yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzham du med paste/
124b4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam// me'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la me'i khams
124b5('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmigs su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang
124b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
124b7('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
125a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du
125a2('bum): byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab bdag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ ming dang gzugs
125a3('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ming dang gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
125a4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmigs su yod dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
125a5('bum): de la reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis mi
125a6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmigs su yod dam/ len pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa pa ste/ mi mnyam
125a7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa dmigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la srid pa dmigs su yod dam/
125b1('bum): skye ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmigs su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste//
125b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rga shi dmigs su yod dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol
125b3('bum): tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
125b4('bum): phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med bzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
125b5('bum): su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mang pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs/
125b6('bum): su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
125b7('bum): su yong ngam/ shes rab kyi ba tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam//
126a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang
126a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
126a3('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
126a4('bum): pa de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid
126a5('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
126a6('bum): 'jus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong
126a7('bum): pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang
126b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi
126b2('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
126b3('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
126b4('bum): dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos
126b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid
126b6('bum): stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
126b7('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs
127a1('bum): su yod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam
127a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
127a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong
127a4('bum): ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
127a5('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
127a6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dbang po rnams dmigs su yod dam/ stobs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la stobs rnams dmigs
127a7('bum): su yong ngam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su yod nam/ 'phags
127b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang bsam gyis mi byab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i/
127b2('bum): bden pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis mi
127b3('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la bsam gtan rnams dmigs su yod dam/ tshad med pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa
127b4('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la tshad med pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
127b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
127b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
127b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
128a1('bum): smon pa med pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
128a2('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su yod dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mngon par shes pa
128a3('bum): rnams dmigs su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su yod dam/
128a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
128a5('bum): stobs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su yod dam/ mi 'jigs pa gang
128a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang bsam gyis mi bya ba
128a7('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
128b1('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la byams pa chen po dmigs su yod dam/ snying rje chen po gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang /
128b2('bum): pa de la snying rje chen po dmigs su yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la sangs
128b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su yod dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
128b4('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su yong dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan
128b5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i
128b6('bum): 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su yod
128b7('bum): dam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub dmigs su yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang
129a1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
129a2('bum): nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
129a3('bum): de ni ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mad gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
129a4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa dang bral ba'i
129a5('bum): phyir dpag tu med pa'o/ / tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des
129a6('bum): na chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag
129a7('bum): ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu med pa'o// tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du med pa'o// /
129b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor
129b2('bum): dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ / rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
129b3('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
129b4('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag tu med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag
129b5('bum): tu med pa'i phyir ro/ / gzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
129b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
129b7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du med do// de ltar bcom ldan
130a1('bum): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong
130a2('bum): lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shu nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen
130a3('bum): pa stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag ni nyi shus ni
130a4('bum): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
130a5('bum): las le'u sum cu bzhi'o/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
130a6('bum): byin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis
130a7('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma
130b1('bum): mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis//
130b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
130b3('bum): don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu
130b4('bum): med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
130b5('bum): pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
130b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni/ nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// chen po stong pa nyid
130b7('bum): 'dus so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus so//
131a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so//
131a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
131a3('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so// dbang po lnga 'dus so// stobs lnga
131a4('bum): 'dus so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so//
131a5('bum): tshad med pa bzhi 'dus so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so// rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so// /
131a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dus so// mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so// gzungs sgo
131a7('bum): rnams 'dus so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so// mi 'jig pa bzhi 'dus so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so//
131b1('bum): snying rje chen po 'dus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// phyir mi
131b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ / dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so// rang byang chub 'dus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so//
131b3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa'am/ yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang
131b4('bum): rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de
131b5('bum): bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab
131b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do// rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i phyir
131b7('bum): bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu med pa'i
132a1('bum): phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di ni bya ba mi mnyam
132a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon
132a3('bum): par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa
132a4('bum): dang mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la
132a5('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//
132a6('bum): rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas
132a7('bum): pa'o/ / lce la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
132b1('bum): nye bar gnas pa'o/ / yid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par
132b2('bum): chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dri la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par
132b3('bum): chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / ro la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// reg la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon
132b4('bum): par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / chos la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su
132b5('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar
132b6('bum): gnas pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med
132b7('bum): pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid
133a1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med
133a2('bum): pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i
133a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
133a4('bum): med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su
133a5('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
133a6('bum): med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i 'dus
133a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su
133b1('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
133b2('bum): nye bar gnas pa'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sa'i khams la yongs su
133b3('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//
133b4('bum): khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
133b5('bum): pabar gnas pa'o/ / nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin
133b6('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du
133b7('bum): byed la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
134a1('bum): nye bar gnas pa'o/ / ming dang gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzin//
134a2('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor ba la yongs su
134a3('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sred pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// len
134a4('bum): pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// srid pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas
134a5('bum): pa'o/ / skye ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rga shi la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye
134a6('bum): pabapar gnas pa'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yod
134a7('bum): su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med
134b1('bum): par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134b2('bum): la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
134b3('bum): nye bar gnas pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon
134b4('bum): par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
134b5('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
134b6('bum): nye bar gnas pa'o/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su
134b7('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar
135a1('bum): gnas pa'o/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med
135a2('bum): ba stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
135a3('bum): med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pArA gnas pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa
135a4('bum): med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//
135a5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
135a6('bum): mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dngos po med
135a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang //
135b1('bum): mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rdzu 'phrul
135b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
135b3('bum): med par nye bar gnas pa'o/ / stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su
135b4('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa

165a6('bum): ma mthong bas/ yongs su mi 'dzin/ yongs su mi 'dzin pas/ nye bar mi len to// rab 'byor ngas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
165a7('bum): bas yongs su mi 'dzin/ yongs su mi 'dzin pas/ nye bar mi len to// rab 'byor ngas kyang dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ yongs su mi

165b2('bum): 'dzin pas/ nye bar mi len to// rab 'byor ngas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ yongs su mi 'dzin/ yongs su mi 'dzin pas/

171b1('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba ste/ mi rtag pa/ rtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ zhi zhing phra la mkhas pa dang / byang ba dang
171b2('bum): yid gsal bas 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o//
171b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan
171b4('bum): 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du
171b5('bum): zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag thams cad la ye shes dang / spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes
171b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing bsams te/ gzhal ba dang / brtag pa dang dpyad pa gnyis ni/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
171b7('bum): gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid ches legs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang
172a1('bum): ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang
172a2('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam
172a3('bum): pab dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam
172a4('bum): pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji
172a5('bum): tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji
172a6('bum): tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ye shes gang
172a7('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye
172b1('bum): shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan/
172b2('bum): 'das kyis/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam
172b3('bum): pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji
172b4('bum): tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam
172b5('bum): pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes gang
172b6('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang
172b7('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir mo 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong bas
173a1('bum): ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// dgra bcom pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /
173a2('bum): spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong
173a3('bum): ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su
173a4('bum): yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni/ myur du
173a5('bum): 'byung bar shes par bya'i/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rig kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/ mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa 'am
173a6('bum): bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod ba dag ni ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes
173a7('bum): su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyud du zhugs pa dang / lar cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang
174a1('bum): rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing rang sangs rgyas rnams byung bar
174a2('bum): gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing
174a3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'grib pa'am 'phel bar yang mi gda' 'o zhes nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag
174a4('bum): gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas de'i ste/ der ga shin tu
174a5('bum): yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do// gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su
174a6('bum): 'khod do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
174a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thes ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing / gong du 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing tshul bzhi du yid la bgyid na
174b1('bum): gang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
174b2('bum): zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/ rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing the tsom mi za nem rur mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za ba mo
174b3('bum): 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang / yid la bya ba de dag dang mi 'bral la/ yid la bya ba de dag 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam/ 'grong
174b4('bum): ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jigs par mi byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor dper
174b5('bum): na ba drus mabe'u mi 'dor ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas/
174b6('bum): dran pas 'gris par ma byas/ yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/ lta bas shin tu khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba de mi gtong na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
174b7('bum): zag de ni/ mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
175a1('bum): pa zab mo 'di thos nas gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to// gong du yang bris shing
175a2('bum): glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to//
175a3('bum): bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas par gyur to// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yang
175a4('bum): thos ma thag tu mos par gyur par blta'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la thos ma thag tu mos shing /
175a5('bum): mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid bgyid pa las// yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan
175a6('bum): 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
175a7('bum): no/ / de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/ shes
175b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro/ / mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri'o// bris nas kyang lung 'bog go// kha ton byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// de ci'i
175b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so// thos nas kyang bzung ngo //
175b3('bum): bcangs so// yongs su bcangs so// bklags so// kun chub par byas so// kha ton du byas so// tshul bzhin du yid la byas so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / yid la byed pa de
175b4('bum): nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas/ mi'i nang du skal ba
175b5('bum): mnyam par skyes na yang / de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byer de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ byang
175b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su bri ba dang / yongs su brtag par byas pas de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes
175b7('bum): par rig par bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa ba po nyis brgya bcu bdun pa// // rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub
178a1('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba thos kyang yongs su mchis/ yongs su brtag pas byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

178b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ / nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sem
