181a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i/

181a7('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//
181b1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ dbang po lnga thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
181b2('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byung chub
181b3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ stobs lnga thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe
181b4('bum): nam nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/
181b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe// nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems
181b6('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thos
181b7('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur// sems
182a1('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris//
182a2('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe// nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du
182a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ bsam gtan bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de
182a4('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
182a5('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ tshad med pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
182a6('bum): zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
182a7('bum): theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
182b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur ba sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthag/
182b2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems
182b3('bum): zhub par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
182b4('bum): pa dgu thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nam nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par
182b5('bum): 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
182b6('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/
182b7('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ mngon par shes pa lnga thos kyang
183a1('bum): yongs su mchis/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nung du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par/
183a2('bum): 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs
183a3('bum): su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//
183a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
183a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nam nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems
183a6('bum): dngapa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
183a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
183b1('bum): sngon gyi mthar/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris// yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe// nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur// sems
183b2('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs
183b3('bum): su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe// nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur// sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam
183b4('bum): pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ byams pa chen po thos kyang yongs su ma dris pa yongs su brtag pa ma byas/
183b5('bum): pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nam nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rngam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
183b6('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ snying rje chen po thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
183b7('bum): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur// sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
184a1('bum): pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ sangs kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
184a2('bum): bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
184a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar/ thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur//
184a4('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/
184a5('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nam nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par
184a6('bum): 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar// bla na med pa yang dag
184a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur
184b1('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar// shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
184b2('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di thos nas yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub
184b3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes
184b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ yongs su dri ba dang yang mi ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yang 'gyur te/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha
184b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/ yongs su ma brtags/ rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyam pa la de tsam gyis dge ba'i bsam pa dang /
184b6('bum): mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing / bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing / shing ba la gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
184b7('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma gzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
185a1('bum): rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/ kha ton du ma byas la/
185a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs
185a3('bum): so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// nang stong pa nyid lam bslabs so//
185a4('bum): gyi stong pa nyid la ma bsgrubs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid lam bslabs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lam bslabs so// chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// don dam pa stong
185a5('bum): pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lam bslabs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//
185a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid lam
185a7('bum): bslabs so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa
185b1('bum): nyid lam bslabs so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lam bslabs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs
185b2('bum): so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ma bslabs so// dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so// stobs rnams la ma bslabs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so//
185b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so// tshad med pa rnams la ma bslabs so//
185b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so//
185b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa lam bslabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams lam bslabs so//
185b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs
185b7('bum): so/ / byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so// snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslab
186a1('bum): so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lam bslabs so// dgra bcom pa nyid lam bslabs so// rang byang chub
186a2('bum): la ma bslabs so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lam bslabs so// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i thegs pa pa de ni
186a3('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba 'am/ klog
186a4('bum): pa'am/ lung dbog pa 'am/ kha ton bya ba 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab
186a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri zhing / lung mi 'bog pa dang / kha ton mi byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi
186a6('bum): 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
186a7('bum): phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang
186b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nying stong
186b2('bum): pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang 'dus byas stong
186b3('bum): pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
186b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
186b5('bum): pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan
186b6('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
186b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa
187a1('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang // stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi
187a2('bum): 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
187a3('bum): pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang gagazugs med pa'i
187a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus
187a5('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan
187a6('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
187a7('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / / mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan
187b1('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi
187b2('bum): 'dogs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dgra btsem pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan
187b3('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan
187b4('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
187b5('bum): mthun par mi spyod/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ nang stong pa
187b6('bum): nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang
187b7('bum): mthun par mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ mtha' las
188a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
188a2('bum): ngadang mthun par mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dngos po med
188a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/
188a4('bum): yang dag par spong rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ stobs rnams dang mthun par mi spyod
188a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams
188a6('bum): dang mthun par mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod//
188a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mthun par mi spyod// mngon
188b1('bum): par shes pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par mi spyod/
188b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod/ byams pa chen po dang mthun par mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dang mthun par mi spyod/ sangs
188b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyir mi 'ong
188b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang byang chub dang mthun par mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rnam pa
188b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na/ de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las/ sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
188b6('bum): rgyas kyi sa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris/ ma bstan
188b7('bum): kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang pha rol la phan ma btags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
189a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par ma spyad pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs
189a2('bum): kyi bu mo des/ gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de las/ sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu lnga'o//
189a3('bum): / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig la mi rnams shing ngam/ shing du ma mam// shing leb dam/ rgyal ba 'am/ rol mi 'jug 'dzin na// rab 'byor mi de dag ni rgya
189a4('bum): mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma byin par dus byed par rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam/ shing dum mam/ shing leb bam/ rgyal ba 'am/ ro la
189a5('bum): 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te/ mnyes ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro//
189a6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo drang pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos btsum dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'ji mi ston
189a7('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston bton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / brtson 'grus
189b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten//
189b2('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin
189b3('bum): du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin
189b4('bum): du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byad/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brtan pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed
189b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston
189b6('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston ba ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi
189b7('bum): 'dri mi snyom bton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang
190a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/
190a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du
190a3('bum): mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi stom kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston
190a4('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi bya / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'di
190a5('bum): mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brtun pa dang
190a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi 'dri mo ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi
190a7('bum): byed cing mi brten pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dbang po rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
190b1('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / stobs rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed// /
190b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
190b3('bum): rnams mi 'dri mi ston pa ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /
190b4('bum): tshad med pa rnam mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brtan pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin
190b5('bum): du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
190b6('bum): dku mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byad/ / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed mi brten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byad// tshul
190b7('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du ying la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
191a1('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi 'dri mi snyom kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
191a2('bum): bcu mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /
191a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / byams pa chen po mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byang
191a4('bum): cing mi brten pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi 'dri mi ston kha tor du mi byed//
191a5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi
191a6('bum): snyom pa ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa de dag ni/
191a7('bum): bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag
191b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod cing bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang
191b2('bum): dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mi gtong ba yod cing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klog go// lung 'bog go// kha ton du byed do//
191b3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// brten par byed do// de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yang yod da/ bzod pa yang yod
191b4('bum): mos pa yang yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
191b5('bum): pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung
191b6('bum): ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
191b7('bum): bzung ba dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
192a1('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
192a2('bum): su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
192a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
192a4('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba
192a5('bum): dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi san
192a6('bum): lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pas yongs su bzung ba dang // 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang
192a7('bum): tshad med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
192b1('bum): pa dgus yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
192b2('bum): gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang
192b3('bum): dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su
192b4('bum): bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas par
192b5('bum): mdor nye zho med par nyan thos kyis las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ sems can yongs su smin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ bla na med
192b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na bud med dam/ skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsrags
192b7('bum): shing som btang bas chu bcu par sems na/ rab 'byor bam pa de ni ring por mi gnas te/ myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bum pa so ma
193a1('bum): btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang bla na med pa yang /
193a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/
193a3('bum): spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam
193a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
193a5('bum): yongs su ma bzung / / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
193a6('bum): bzung / / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
193a7('bum): ma bzung / / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba
193b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
193b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
193b3('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams
193b4('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung /
193b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
193b6('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
193b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
194a1('bum): yongs su ma bzung / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung // mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzu //
194a2('bum): byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
194a3('bum): bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
194a4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya bco brgyad pa//
194a5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma dor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab
194a6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam/ mtsho 'am/ 'tshe'u 'am/ khron pa nas chu chun/ rab 'byor chu chu ba de'i bum pa nges
194a7('bum): ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ngang pa yang yod/
194b1('bum): bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yong/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la/ de yang shes rab kyi
194b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
194b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
194b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'azung / don dam pa stong pa
194b5('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang
194b6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
194b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
195a1('bum): yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong bas yongs su
195a2('bum): bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung / dbang pos yongs su bzung / stobs kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
195a3('bum): brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pas yongs su bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
195a4('bum): pas yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
195a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshes/
195a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen

195b1('bum): bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma
195b2('bum): dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/ ma nyes ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na
195b3('bum): rgya mtsho'i grum bsdams shing zag glan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste chu la btang na/ rab 'byor gru de ni zhig par 'gyur te/ gru yang logs shig/ rdzas kyang logs shig tu song nas// de ltar tshong
195b4('bum): bapa de thabs mi mkhas pas gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rin po che chen po las yongs su 'phang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
195b5('bum): po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ngad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang
195b6('bum): yod mi gtong ba yang yod/ rtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam

202a4('bum): su ma bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
202a5('bum): dper na mi na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon brgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'khogs pa de nyid kyi lus la rlung ngam/ mabris pa 'am/ bad kan nam// 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la/ de khri las ldang bar 'dod na de
202a6('bum): la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis glo g.yas g.yon nas bzung ste/ brten nas 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod ci dga' ba'i don du gar 'dod par 'dong ngo // khyod ni bdag cag gis gnas der ma byin gyi bar du
202a7('bum): lamadu bar mdor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dang pa yang
202b1('bum): yod bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b2('bum): phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol
202b3('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid
202b4('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
202b5('bum): yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // thog ma dang
202b6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
202b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
203a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rdzu
203a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i
203a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung // gzugs
203a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar
203a5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung
203a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung
203a7('bum): byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
203b1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/
203b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par rus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de skar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203b3('bum): phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
203b4('bum): pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub
203b5('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ thog mar sbyin pa
203b6('bum): yongs su gtong na bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pasgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par
203b7('bum): 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom na de yang bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su
204a1('bum): gtong ngo / / 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o// bdag ni tshul byis sa srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di byung ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan
204a2('bum): pa'o/ / bdag ni bzod pasgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan
204a3('bum): pa'o/ / bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni

204b1('bum): kyis rlom sems su byeng / bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

204b5('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ring du song ba yang mi shes/ pha rol yang mi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /

207a1('bum): tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ltar yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang mi shes/ pha rol yang mi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su

208a5('bum): na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / / tshul khrims srung na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ngo //
208a6('bum): bzod pa sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo//
208a7('bum): bsam gtan sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan sgom mo// shes rab sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/
208b1('bum): de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa gtang ngo zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims
208b2('bum): ni 'di srung ngo zhes bya bar mi sems so/ / bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo zhes
208b3('bum): rba bar ma mams so/ / bdag ri bsam gtaran rnams ma sgoms par 'jug s+ho// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jun go zhes bya ba mi mams so// bdagra ni shes rab snyam b+h+yo/
208b4('bum): shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do//
208b5('bum): tshul khrims rlom sems su mi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// bzod pa rlom sems su mi byed//
208b6('bum): bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// brtson 'grus rlom sems su mi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su
208b7('bum): mi byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// bsam gtan rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed
209a1('bum): bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do/ / shes rab rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni shes rab
209a2('bum): dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di
209a3('bum): ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byang ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med// 'di ltar tshul
209a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i
209a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med dang 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
209a6('bum): phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a7('bum): ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu
209b1('bum): phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ltar yid la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po de lang ring du song ba shes shing / pha rol shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
209b2('bum): phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
209b3('bum): yongs su bzung bas/ / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas//
209b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos
209b5('bum): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
209b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
209b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung
210a1('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/
210a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
210a3('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
210a4('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
210a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas
210a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa
210a7('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
210b1('bum): kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis
210b2('bum): yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas
210b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa'am
210b4('bum): rang sangs kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
210b5('bum): sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung
210b6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam
210b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
210b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
210b9('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams
210b10('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
210b11('bum): nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur
210b12('bum): ro/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang po
210b13('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams kyis yongs su
210b14('bum): bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan
210b15('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa
210b16('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
210b17('bum): rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/
210b18('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
210b19('bum): nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ ngang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
210b20('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub
210b21('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung bas// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
210b22('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
210b23('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
210b24('bum): rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam
210b25('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
210b26('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
210b27('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs
210b28('bum): su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
210b29('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/
210b30('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
210b31('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
210b32('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub
210b33('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// /
210b34('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyes brgya bcu dgu pa// / rab 'byor de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
210b35('bum): byin pas yongs su bzung ba/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
211a1('bum): su bzung ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi stong pa nyid
211a2('bum): gyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
211a3('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thog ma dang
211a4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs
211a5('bum): su bzung ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngo bo nyid
211a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su
211a7('bum): bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzu'ab/ stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/
211b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba
211b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/ rnam
211b3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung
211b4('bum): ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa
211b5('bum): bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thams cad
211b6('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
211b7('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ thog mar thabs
212a1('bum): dang ldan par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs dang ldan par tshul khrims srung / thabs dang ldan par bzod pa sgom/ thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs dang
212a2('bum): ldan par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs dang ldan par shes rab sgom zhing / 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sbyin pa 'di yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongs su
212a3('bum): gtang ngo snyam du mi sems so/ / 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi
212a4('bum): sems so/ / 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni/
212a5('bum): 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so// de sbyin pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom
212a6('bum): sems su mi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de tshul khrims rlom sems su mi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sem
212a7('bum): su mi byed do/ / de bzod pa rlom sems su mi byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de brtson 'grus rlom sems su mi byed/ brtsom
212b1('bum): 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de bsam gtan rlom sems su mi byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni
212b2('bum): bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do/ / de shes rab rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do//
212b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha
212b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha
212b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o/ / de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/
212b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de sbyar de rnam par mi rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ 'i bIr zhe na
212b7('bum): 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de
213a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
213a2('bum): ba la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yang yin la gang zag byang chub sems
213a3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring du song bar shes shing la rol shes kyang / des rlom sems su mi byed de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
213a4('bum): pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas
213a5('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong
213a6('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
213a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
213b1('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
213b2('bum): bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
213b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
213b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po
213b5('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs
213b6('bum): su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang // gzugs med pa'i snyoms
213b7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar
214a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
214a2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang /
214a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
214a4('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yod
214a5('bum): su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu
214a6('bum): drug go/ / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
214a7('bum): bos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par gyi/ / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi// ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i
214b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
214b2('bum): pa/ rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
214b3('bum): 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
214b4('bum): pa la bslab par 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston
214b5('bum): pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de dag la bstan par bya'o// bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bar bya'o// de dag de la shes rab kyi pha rol
214b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang
214b7('bum): dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
215a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig
215a2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab gang dang gang sgom
215a3('bum): pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ tshor bar
215a4('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du shes su rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ mig tu rtog par ma byed cig/ rna bar rtog par ma
215a5('bum): byed cig/ snar rtog par ma byed cig/ lcer rtog par ma byed cig/ lus su rtog par ma byed cig/ yid du rtog par ma byed cig/ gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ slar rtog par
215a6('bum): ma byed cig/ drir rtog par ma byed cig/ ror rtog par ma byed cig/ reg tu rtog par ma byed cig/ chos su rtog par ma byed cig/ mig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig
215a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma
215b1('bum): byed cig/ yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ mig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ rnga ba'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg par/

215b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig
215b5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ me'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rlung gi khams
215b6('bum): su rtog par ma byed cig/ nam mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma rig par rtog par

216a1('bum): par rtog par ma byed cig/ sred par rtog par ma byed cig/ len par rtog par ma byed cig/ srid par rtog par ma byed cig/ skye bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rga shir rtog par ma byed
216a2('bum): cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig/ bzod pa'i pha rol

216a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig

216b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par

220b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i snying rje chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

220b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rigs kyi bu khyod gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni
221a1('bum): gzugs so/ / tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni tshor ba'o// 'du shes la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
221a2('bum): 'dod pa med pa ni 'du shes so/ / 'du byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
221a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/ / mig la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mig go// rna ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
221a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'o// sna la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sna'o// lU la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
221a5('bum): bu 'dod pa med pa ni lce'o/ / lus la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lus so// yid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
221a6('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid do/ / gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni gzugs so// sgra la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
221a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sla'o/ / dri la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dri'o// ro la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
221b1('bum): bu 'dod pa med pa ni ro'o/ / reg la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni reg go// chos la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
221b2('bum): pa med pa ni chos so/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma
221b3('bum): spyad cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sna'i
221b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'o/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma spyad cig/
221b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// /
221b6('bum): mig gi 'jus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma spyad cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
221b7('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te rag
222a1('bum): pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
222a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi
222a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
222a4('bum): tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig

222a6('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa meng ba ni lus kyi
222a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
