296b4('bum): ba dang 'bral ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ge cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa
296b5('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang
296b6('bum): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
296b7('bum): ni dbang po dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas// de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o//
297a1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha don stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ bci phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems
297a2('bum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/
297a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'bral ba ma yin zhes bya'o//
297a4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams
297a5('bum): kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
297a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/
297a7('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
297b1('bum): rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
297b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go/
297b3('bum): cha de ni tshadan med pa dang 'bral ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
297b4('bum): rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel ba ma
297b5('bum): yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu med
297b6('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
297b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
298a1('bum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
298a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
298a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
298a4('bum): med pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes
298a5('bum): pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
298a6('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ting
298a7('bum): nge 'dzin dang 'brel ba ma yim zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i so ma don gzungs kyi sgong nga 'brel ba ma yin te/ rdo tso'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi na
298b1('bum): rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go/
298b2('bum): cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas
298b3('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
298b4('bum): na rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
298b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
298b6('bum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel
298b7('bum): kha na yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o//
299a1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang shin tu med la/
299a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
299a3('bum): pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
299a4('bum): ma 'dres pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
299a5('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go chad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
299a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
299a7('bum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong
299b1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir po cha de ni phyir mi
299b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
299b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
299b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni
299b5('bum): rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
299b6('bum): 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go chad ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang
299b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang
300a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300a2('bum): c hen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams
300a3('bum): cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan
300a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub
300a5('bum): sems dpa' sems chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
300a6('bum): dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad
300a7('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su
300b1('bum): dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes// /
300b2('bum): cung zad gi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
300b3('bum): bzla ba'i slad du go na 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
300b4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can nyung zad 'i tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma ya ni/ ye shes cung zad kyi/
300b5('bum): tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
300b6('bum): ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci yang bsgom
300b7('bum): par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/ bang sgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang
301a1('bum): gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha'/
301a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
301a3('bum): pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
301a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gang bsgom
301a5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
301a6('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du
301a7('bum): shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang
301b1('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa 'di ni
301b2('bum): mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
301b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam
301b4('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na// lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
301b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par
301b6('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
301b7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
302a1('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
302a2('bum): pab bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
302a3('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
302a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam
302a5('bum): par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
302a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
302a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
302b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
302b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lho'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa
302b3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
302b4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
302b5('bum): tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas
302b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ / lho'i 'dus te reg da'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi bdus te reg pa'i rkyen
302b7('bum): phyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/
303a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams/
303a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
303a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par
303a4('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
303a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa
303a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
303a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug
303b1('bum): / bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
303b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
303b3('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
303b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
303b5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga sho bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
303b6('bum): bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
303b7('bum): lha ste/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par
304a1('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gsob bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab/
304a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// /
304a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shad can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
304a4('bum): pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
304a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
304a6('bum): pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
304a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
304b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
304b2('bum): 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
304b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
304b4('bum): lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
304b5('bum): pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
304b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
304b7('bum): rol su phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa
305a1('bum): nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// /
305a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
305a3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
305a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
305a5('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
305a6('bum): pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa
305a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
305b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po//
305b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
305b3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
305b4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom
305b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
305b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam
305b7('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
306a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dpags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
306a2('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par
306a3('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
306a4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
306a5('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom
306a6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mu med pa dang / smon pa med
306a7('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
306b1('bum): / n+yA ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi/
306b2('bum): sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dri ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
306b3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so /
306b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
306b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs
306b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskyon pa 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
306b7('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
307a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
307a2('bum): pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
307a3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307a4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di
307a5('bum): lha ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
307a6('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du
307a7('bum): byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
307b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
307b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom
307b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
307b4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
307b5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/
307b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa
307b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
308a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
308a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par
308a4('bum): shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
308a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
308a6('bum): rtaba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
308a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
308b1('bum): pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
308b2('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyis
308b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus
308b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
308b5('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
308b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/
308b7('bum): sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
309a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na
309a2('bum): rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
309a3('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa
309a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
309a5('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
309a6('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
309a7('bum): pa 'di ni/ reg par bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
309b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
309b2('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
309b3('bum): 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
309b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam
309b5('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
309b6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
309b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag
310a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom nga'o// rab 'byor 'di
310a2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa
310a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom
310a4('bum): pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
310a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
310a6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
310a7('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310b1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par
310b2('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310b3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
310b4('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
310b5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
310b6('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
310b7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
311a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
311a2('bum): ba'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
311a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgos pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
311a4('bum): bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
311a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong
311a6('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
311a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
311b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
311b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po
311b3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
311b4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
311b5('bum): brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
311b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa bsgom pa
311b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
312a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
312a2('bum): 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
312a3('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa
312a4('bum): rnam par sgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
312a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa
312a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
312a7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam
312b1('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
312b3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
312b4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni//
312b5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
312b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
312b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di
313a1('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
313a2('bum): mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon
313a3('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
313a4('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
313a5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
313a6('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa meng dam zhes/ tshul khrims kyi pha
313a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
313b1('bum): / chags pa med dam zhes/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang
313b2('bum): stong pa nyid la bangon par chags pa med dam zhes/ nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
313b3('bum): po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
313b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
313b5('bum): dnga' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
313b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab
313b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
314a1('bum): su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
314a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/
314a3('bum): bdus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon
314a4('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
314a5('bum): chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dang zhes/ thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// /
314a6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
314a7('bum): su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa mang ngam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
314b1('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems// /
314b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rang gi mtshan
314b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
314b4('bum): pa med dam zhes/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa
314b5('bum): nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'o/
314b6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
314b7('bum): chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par du'o/
315a1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'/
315a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la
315a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rdzu
315a4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa
315a5('bum): med dam zhes/ dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par
315a6('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag
315a7('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
315b1('bum): ma sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
315b2('bum): brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'
315b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan rnams
315b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
315b5('bum): tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
315b6('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su banag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
315b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brnab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
316a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
316a2('bum): rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
316a3('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
316a4('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la
316a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med nam zhes/ ting nge
316a6('bum): 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med
316a7('bum): nam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
316b1('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
316b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
316b3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
316b4('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa'
316b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa'
316b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sangs
316b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid
317a1('bum): la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'//
317a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
317a3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
317a4('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bar po nyis brgya nyer lnga pa// / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
317a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
317a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
317a7('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed
317b1('bum): pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed las 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
317b2('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta ma/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
317b3('bum): bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur
317b4('bum): ta ma zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par
317b5('bum): mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing
317b6('bum): 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sngon
317b7('bum): gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag par byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
318a1('bum): byas par rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i
318a2('bum): tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid kyi phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang yongasu 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog
318a3('bum): cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
318a4('bum): bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes
318a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
318a6('bum): pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsol da/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i
318a7('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang rab 'byor stong pa nyid la
318b1('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
318b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
318b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
318b4('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
318b5('bum): rab 'byor 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas
318b6('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba med
318b7('bum): ba la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
319a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
319a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
319a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
319a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
319a5('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
319a6('bum): yin/ rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhos
319a7('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
319b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
319b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
319b3('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// gsol pa/
319b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma
319b5('bum): med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
319b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
319b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
320a1('bum): mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
320a2('bum): rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320a3('bum): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi
320a4('bum): dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam
320a5('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
320a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
320a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
320b1('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyuragazugs brnyan
320b2('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
320b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sdug rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
320b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
320b5('bum): sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
320b6('bum): chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags
320b7('bum): sam/ mig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ snal rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid
321a1('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg
321a2('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa

321a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi
