321a6('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
321a7('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khams la
321b1('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtogs pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags
321b2('bum): sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa
321b3('bum): lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam
321b4('bum): rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags
321b5('bum): sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam nang stong pa nyid
321b6('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa
321b7('bum): lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
322a1('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
322a2('bum): sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa
322a3('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa
322a4('bum): lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa
322a5('bum): lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam
322a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la
322a7('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog
322b1('bum): pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa 'gas sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
322b2('bum): stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam
322b3('bum): snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam kyi rnam dang shes pa nyid la
322b4('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
322b5('bum): po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin ro// rig la
322b6('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ / rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna la rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rtog pa ma yin no// lus la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog par yin no// gzugs la rtog pa ma yin ro//
322b7('bum): sgra la rtog pa ma yin no// dri la rtog pa ma yin no// ro la rtog pa ma yin no// reg la rtog pa ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam
323a1('bum): par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma
323a2('bum): yin no/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce
323a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog
323a4('bum): pa ma yin no/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
323a5('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin ro/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa
323a6('bum): ma yin no/ / chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i
323a7('bum): khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ / ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug
323b1('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ / reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no// len pa la rtog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye ba la rtog pa
323b2('bum): yin no/ / rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// brtson
323b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// /
323b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la
323b5('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa
323b6('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid
323b7('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo
324a1('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
324a2('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ / dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma
324a3('bum): yin no/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
324a4('bum): nortog pa ma yin no/ / rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
324a5('bum): dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs
324a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// snying rje
324a7('bum): chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no//
324b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sus kyang ma byas/ rnam
324b2('bum): par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang
324b3('bum): 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so/ / gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor bas ma
324b4('bum): yin no/ / 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gis ma yin no// rna bas ma yin no// snas ma yin no// lces ma yin no// lus
324b5('bum): kyis ma yin no/ / yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin no// sgras ma yin no// dris ma yin no// ros ma yin no// reg gis ma yin no// chos kyis ma yin no// mig gi rnam
324b6('bum): par shes pas ma yin no/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma
324b7('bum): yin no/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg
325a1('bum): pas ma yin no/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// rna nga'i 'dus
325a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor byas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
325a3('bum): tshor bas ma yin no/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sa'i khams kyis ma yin no// chu'i khams kyis ma yin no// me'i khams kyis ma yin no// rlung gi khams
325a4('bum): kyis ma yin no/ / nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no// ma rig pas ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no//
325a5('bum): ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no// skye mched drug gis ma yin no// reg pas ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// sred pas ma yin no// len pas ma yin no// srid pas ma yin no// skye bas
325a6('bum): ma yin no/ / rga shis ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha
325a7('bum): rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//
325b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
325b2('bum): no/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
325b3('bum): no/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos
325b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag
325b5('bum): par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no// stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin
325b6('bum): no/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
325b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar gyos gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no// rnam par thar
326a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no//
326a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
326a3('bum): byams pa chen pos ma yin no// snying rje chen pos ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong
326a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rnam pa
326a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
326a6('bum): 'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig nyid kyang
326a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus nyid
326b1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// smra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dz+ra
326b2('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
326b3('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
326b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do/ / lha'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa
326b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
326b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus
326b7('bum): te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam
327a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa
327a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
327a3('bum): nyid do/ / sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// me'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rlung
327a4('bum): gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
327a5('bum): ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ming dang gzugs
327a6('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams
327a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye ba nyid
327b1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
327b2('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
327b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
327b4('bum): pa nyid do/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
327b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus
327b6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
327b7('bum): pa nyid do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328a1('bum): pa nyid do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong
328a2('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dran
328a3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang
328a4('bum): po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam
328a5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
328a6('bum): tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
328a7('bum): nyid do/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang rnam
328b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams
328b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam
328b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang
328b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
328b5('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin
328b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/
329a1('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de
329a2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
329a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi de
329a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
329a5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

329a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin

329b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
