330a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
330a7('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
330b1('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
330b2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// /
330b3('bum): chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
330b4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
330b5('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
330b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
330b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
331a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
331a2('bum): cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
331a3('bum): gcig pa'o/ / reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams ca
331a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
331a5('bum): len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
331a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
331a7('bum): rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
331b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin//
331b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// /
331b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
331b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
331b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
331b6('bum): gcig pa'o/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin zhing gcig pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
331b7('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nying gcig pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de 'dzin nyid
332a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
332a2('bum): gcig pa'o/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
332a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
332a4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
332a5('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// /
332a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
332a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
332b1('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi dmigs
332b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
332b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
332b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
332b5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams
332b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
332b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
333a1('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang
333a2('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin
333a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
333a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de
333a5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
333a6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
333a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
333b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
333b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
333b3('bum): gcig pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
333b4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
333b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
333b6('bum): nyid gcig pa'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i
333b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
334a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid
334a2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu brgyad do// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag
334a3('bum): brgya pa bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa/ / // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang
334a4('bum): pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
334a5('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to//
334a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa
334a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam
334b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par
334b2('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna
334b3('bum): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad
334b4('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
334b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
334b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sba'o/ / dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
334b7('bum): nyid kyang ro'o/ / reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so//
335a1('bum): mog gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
335a2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//
335a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lho'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
335a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//
335a5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
335a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te
335a7('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
335b1('bum): nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
335b2('bum): gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
335b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus
335b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/
335b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg
335b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
335b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad
336a1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi
336a2('bum): khams so/ / nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
336a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams
336a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming
336a5('bum): dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
336a6('bum): nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ / reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
336a7('bum): pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ / sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
336b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ / srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
336b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ / rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
336b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
336b4('bum): pa'o/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams
336b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
336b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
336b7('bum): phyin pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad
337a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam
337a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid
337a3('bum): do/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
337a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las
337a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste
337a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
337a7('bum): do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
337b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//
337b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
337b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i
337b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
337b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ / yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//
337b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
337b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ / stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa
338a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste//
338a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
338a3('bum): so/ / bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
338a4('bum): pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
338a5('bum): so/ / rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams
338a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
338a7('bum): med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par
338b1('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma byan pa
338b2('bum): nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ / gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa
338b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
338b4('bum): pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams
338b5('bum): pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
338b6('bum): nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
338b7('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
339a1('bum): do/ / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cang gnyis su byur med//
339a2('bum): do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin
339a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
339a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin
339a5('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
339a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
339a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
339b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
339b2('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
339b3('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
339b4('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ / sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
339b5('bum): dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // ro'i de bzhin nyid
339b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen la nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yinapa
339b7('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
340a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa de// gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
340a2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
340a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
340a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
340a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de
340a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
340a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg
340b1('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg
340b2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar mang ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
340b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i 'dus te ra
340b4('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te
340b5('bum): reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus
340b6('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing banyis su byar med do// mig gi
340b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
341a1('bum): med do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
341a2('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
341a3('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ljo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
341a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
341a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
341a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
341a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
341b1('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma byan pa nyid kyi
341b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
341b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
341b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
341b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
341b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
341b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
342a1('bum): nyid gcig pa de/ / gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
342a2('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
342a3('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
342a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid/
342a5('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
342a6('bum): ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
342a7('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
342b1('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
342b2('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ / rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
342b3('bum): byar med do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
342b4('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
342b5('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
342b6('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
342b7('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
343a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
343a2('bum): su byar med do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
343a3('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
343a4('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
343a5('bum): tsugs te/ gzhes su med cing gnyis smra byan med na// rnga bo ni stong rgya kyi rna bcan nyid kyang ldan pa dang / rnam sna rnams cad ma khyen pa nyad kyin maman can gang yin pa de ni/
343a6('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
343a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
343b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
343b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam
343b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
343b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
343b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/
343b6('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
343b7('bum): brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
344a1('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
344a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
344a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
344a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
344a5('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
344a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
344a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
344b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
344b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
344b3('bum): pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
344b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
344b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dor ba med pa
344b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang bzhin
344b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos thams
345a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
345a2('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste
345a3('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
345a4('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
345a5('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
345a6('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
345a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
345b1('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
345b2('bum): med do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
345b3('bum): su byar med do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
345b4('bum): su byar med do/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
345b5('bum): med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
345b6('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su med cing
345b7('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
346a1('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do/ / byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
346a2('bum): steganyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
346a3('bum): ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
346a4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
346a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
346a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
346a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
346b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
346b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid pa
346b3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
346b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs
346b5('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir
346b6('bum): 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
346b7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// /
347a1('bum): dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med/
347a2('bum): do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang
347a3('bum): chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs
347a4('bum): rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes ston pa ni/ 'di lta
347a5('bum): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing / brtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/
347a6('bum): nizhing phra ba/ zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
347a7('bum): gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
347b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ / tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
347b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
347b3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
347b4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
347b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
347b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
347b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sba'o/ / dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
348a1('bum): pa nyid kyang ro'o/ / reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
348a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa
348a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
348a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
348a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
348a6('bum): nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
348a7('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
348b1('bum): nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa
348b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
348b3('bum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis chos
348b4('bum): ba'o/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i
348b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg
348b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
348b7('bum): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam
349a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad
349a2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams
349a3('bum): so/ / me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
349a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ / nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//
349a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
349a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par
349a7('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
349b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ / skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid rnam
349b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//
349b3('bum): sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
349b4('bum): kyang len pa'o/ / srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
349b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ / rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams
349b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
349b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i
350a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
350a2('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab
350a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
350a4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//
350a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
350a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid
350a7('bum): do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
350b1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
350b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las
350b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// /
350b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
350b5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
350b6('bum): kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
350b7('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
351a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med
351a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
351a3('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong
351a4('bum): ba rnams so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
351a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ / stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad
351a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
351a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid
351b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
351b2('bum): tshad med pa rnams so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
351b3('bum): rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
351b4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa
351b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
351b6('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams
351b7('bum): so/ / gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
352a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi
352a2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad
352a3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras
352a4('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
352a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong
352a6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
352a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ / rang byang chub kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
352b1('bum): bste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang la ma gyi rnam pa shes pa'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
352b2('bum): pa nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyes ngargya nyer bdun pa// /

357a5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin

357a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
357b1('bum): yin pa dang / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
357b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa
357b3('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /

357b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

358a1('bum): zhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

358b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su/

359a1('bum): byar med do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa snun gnyis m
359a2('bum): ed cing gnyis su byar med do/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su

359a5('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byams pa

360b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las chung
360b2('bum): ba la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud
360b3('bum): par dka' zhing / brtag tu med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba/ zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ da ni sus
360b4('bum): kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag
360b5('bum): nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha'
360b6('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
360b7('bum): 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon
361a1('bum): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / mngon
361a2('bum): par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos padi zab bo// lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i

361b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab go//
362a1('bum): lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab bo// lha'i bu dang/

362b1('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i

362b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi/
362b4('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa

362b7('bum): dag dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bab pa'i phyir chos 'di zababo/ / lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid bab pa'i phyir chos 'di
363a1('bum): zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dngos/
